structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 1. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 13. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 1.
